name: King Arthur
overview: King Arthur is an Empire-style strategy war game set in the time of knights of the round table. A war game in which you really are t war, your strategy has to be right, because if it isn't you will not survive. A wrong decision or an error in judgement could cost you your life or the lives of your army. Eight battles must be fought and won to allow you to fight the battle of Mount Baden to unify Britain under one King. Will you be that next king?
